parsetree.*:
<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value> arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.34
</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value> global

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> Ropes and Sling Loading

</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value>Enables or disables the ability to be attached to a rope end for the given entity.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value>entity [[enableRopeAttach]] enable

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> entity: [[Object]] - given entity

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> enable: [[Boolean]] - [[false]] to disable rope attachment

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[vehicle]] [[player]] [[enableRopeAttach]] [[false]];</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[ropes]], [[canSlingLoad]], [[getSlingLoad]], [[ropeAttachedObjects]], [[ropeAttachTo]], [[ropeDestroy]], [[ropeLength]], [[ropeUnwound]], [[ropeAttachedTo]], [[ropeCreate]], [[ropeDetach]], [[ropeAttachEnabled]], [[ropeCut]], [[ropeEndPosition]], [[ropeUnwind]], [[setSlingLoad]], [[slingLoadAssistantShown]]
</value></part></template>

<dl class="command_description">

<dd class="notedate">Posted on 05 April, 2014</dd>
<dt class="note">[[User:Waffle SS.|Waffle SS.]]</dt>
<dd class="note">Attachable nearby vehicles may not update on Sling Load Assistant until re-opened.<br>

</dl>

<template lineStart="1"><title>GameCategory</title><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>Scripting Commands</value></part></template></root>
